name: Way of Rhea
description:
Way of Rhea is an upcoming puzzle platformer that takes place in a world where you can only interact with objects that match your current color.

Way of Rhea got its start as prototype built with in-house tech for Playcrafting's 2018 Spring Play expo. Due to the positive reception it received at the expo, it's now being developed into a full game by a small indie team spread across the US.
